methods.doc:
Turns a number into an ordinal string used to denote the position in an
ordered sequence such as 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th.

  ordinalize(1)     # => "1st"
  ordinalize(2)     # => "2nd"
  ordinalize(1002)  # => "1002nd"
  ordinalize(1003)  # => "1003rd"
  ordinalize(-11)   # => "-11th"
  ordinalize(-1021) # => "-1021st"
